segments.text: Wow ! I can ’ t believe I ’ m standing here !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you so excited about ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m standing in front of an exquisite work of art !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ’ s the big deal ? It ’ s just a picture of some woman .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ Ve seen it so many times in books , but I never imagined I ’ d get to see it in person .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are tons of other paintings that I think are better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe so , but do you have any idea how much this one is worth ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , how much is it worth ?
segments.speaker: S2
